mapper.insert: insert into t_device_active_info (info_id, info_num, record_date, create_time, country, province, city, district, plateform, device_model, device_oem, screen_size, os_version, download_channel, version, net_status, network_operators) values (#{info_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateform,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{device_model,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{device_oem,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{screen_size,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{os_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{download_channel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{net_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{network_operators,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
